Sometimes no matter what you do the smell sticks in the jar. To get rid of it, wash the jar with a mixture of one teaspoon of powdered mustard with one quart warm water.#cleaning #cleaningtips #kitchenhacks pic.twitter.com/WYj2CZ0ZQR

Carpet cleaning is a tough chore even without spills. But don’t let spills give you nightmares. Remove liquid as much as you can, spray the stain with a solution half vinegar and half water. Let it sit for a few minutes then blot with a towel.#carpet #carpetcleaning #spill pic.twitter.com/MLFjDrxFar

To keep your stainless steel appliances shiny for a longer time mix 1 cup of baking soda with 1/4 cup of lemon juice and 3 tablespoons borax. Add enough club soda to make a thick paste and rub on your appliances. Wipe it off with another wet cloth and finish it with a damp cloth. pic.twitter.com/DpJyCneHNq

When hot weather hits you hard use every trick to survive.
